name: Cardinals (DRC-20)
description: The smallest indivisible unit in Dogecoin is defined as elon. One doge is equivalent to 100,000,000 elons. Every elon is serially numbered, starting at 0, in the order in which it is mined. These numbers are termed "cardinal numbers", or "cardinals", as they are cardinal numbers in the mathematical sense, giving the order of each elon in the totally supply.
